Info¶

member¶

Retrieve information about a member of the guild. If no arguments are passed, information about the author is used. This command works without mentions. Remove the ‘@’ before your mention so you don’t ping the person unnecessarily. You can pick a member by: - Username (cooldude) - Username and discriminator (cooldude#1234) - ID (326749693969301506) - Nickname - must be exact and is case-sensitive (“Mr. Cool Dude III | Team 1234”) - Mention (not recommended) (@Mr Cool Dude III | Team 1234)

`{prefix}member`: show your member info

{prefix}member {ctx.me}: show my member info role ++++ Retrieve info about a role in this guild

rolemembers¶

Retrieve members who have this role

guild¶

Retrieve information about this guild.

`{prefix}guild` - get information about this guild

Dozer
